title: The Alignment Chart

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose a player and give them an alignment. Something different will happen based on which alignment you choose

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The alignments you may choose from and their effects are:
**Lawful Good:** Turn someone into a Town Power.
**Neutral Good:** Turn someone into a town support role
**Chaotic Good:** Turn someone into a town killing role
**Lawful neutral:** Turn someone into a neutral benign
**True Neutral:** Turn someone into Survivor (96)
**Neutral chaotic:** Turn someone into a Neutral Chaos role
**Lawful evil:** Turn someone into a support role for the local REF
**Neutral Evil:** Turn someone into an NE role
**Chaotic Evil:** Turn someone into a killing role in an REF that is in play
-Your abilities will fail if you attempt to put someone into a faction they’re already in

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert 5 people out of their original faction without dying
